title: Curly Fries
directions: Make sure you wash the potatoes well. Cut a small slice off one end and attach the spiky grip of the spiralizer. Cutting a flat side makes it easier to stay on the spiralizer, without this it doesn’t turn as well.
Spiralize the quantity required and then a little extra. They are terribly moreish.
Dry the fries well in some kitchen towel to removes exess water and spread evenly on a baking tray.
Drizzle over a little sesame oil and bake for about 20 minutes, turning occasionally.
ingredients: Some unpeeled and well washed potatoes
Some toasted sesame oil (or whatever oil you have to hand)
